name: South African Airways A350 Business Class to New York JFK
description:
I am not traveling now and encourage you to do the same. Please #StayHome. Here's a video with my thoughts on the current travel situation: 
http://jeb.flights/travel

This trip on South African Airways A350 in Business Class occurred on February 20, 2020, before the current travel restrictions went into place. Also, in the time since I traveled, South African Airways has allegedly begun discussions to lay off all of its staff. It looks like South African Airways may have flown its final flight. I hope that’s not true.

At the time I flew, South African Airways operated four A350’s. Two originally from Hainan Airlines and two from Air Mauritius. 

In this video, I’ll share the trip in the South African Airways A350 from Cape Town to Johannesburg and the longer flight on to New York.

We’ll explore the seat, the food, the service, and the overall experience of flying in Business Class with South African Airways in their A350.

Here’s a link to the unedited take-off and landing footage: 
https://youtu.be/HrQSjhdtMak

For more trip reports, please subscribe to my channel! 
http://www.JebBrooksFlies.com 

Check me out on Instagram: 
https://www.instagram.com/jebbrooksflies 

Follow me on Instagram:
https://twitter.com/jebbrooks

And don't forget to take a look at my travel blog: 
https://greenergrass.com/ 

Music: 
Whisper of the Pines – Howard Harper-Barnes
A Place for Us – Howard Harper-Barnes
End of the Beginning – Fabien Tell
Try Try Try – Airae
A Deeper Sleep – Ecobel
Barefoot (Instrumental Version) – Slowfly
